windows.title: Rough Priorities Assignment - Google Docs - Google Chrome

content.title: Rough Priorities Assignment
content.visibleText:
Rough Priorities Assignment

Magic Academy
Mohamed (Gameplay)
Giovanny (Combat)
Abhineet (Multiplayer)
Vedran (Monetization)
1. Add a field to the profile screen to redeem voucher codes
2. In-app purchase for premium membership
 a. Collect parent email and address
 b. Allow parent to customize which rewards are enabled
3. Prompt to rate the app
4. Local notification reminders to play (daily streak, offline rewards)
5. Push notification when your friends are playing
6. In-app purchase for equipment LAMBDA-73735
7. In-app purchase for season pass
 a. Free rewards in one column
 b. Premium rewards in another column (diamonds and unique equipment / customizations)
 c. Complete blocks to earn progress and unlock subsequent rewards
 d. Change the graphic on the blocks to be 3 pass points instead of diamonds directly
 e. Progress resets and prizes rotate every 3 months, and the pass must be re-purchased
8. Advent calendar with prizes for logging in
 a. Each day you log in, get the next prize in the list (coins, pet food, pass points, etc)
 b. Prizes #14 and #28 are bigger prizes (such as unique customization unlock)
 c. Prizes refresh on the 1st of each month (so if you didn't log in enough times, you miss out on bigger prizes)
Antoine (Academic UI)
1. Use new API 'getTeachTowerStack' to retrieve blocks and recommendations LAMBDA-75799
 a. UI part of https://ws-lambda.atlassian.net/browse/LAMBDA-750 Fix GraphQL issue on mobile
 a. When spending diamonds in the shop, the balance at the top of the UI doesn't update right away
 b. Make sure you can't accidentally double-click to purchase an item twice
3. Prototype rendering stimulus-based MDL content type (basically, adding support for an image in the rotation selection)
4. Add a celebration screen on block completion that shows what rewards were earned (we should give coins to free users, and coins + diamonds to premium users).
5. Apple Authentication LAMBDA-73846
